tracer.renders

Class Render

  • java.lang.Object
    • tracer.renders.Render
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RenderClique, RenderMesh, RenderShape

    public abstract class Render
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Draws a list of Point objects in some way using the PGraphics class from Processing.
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]
